word: H4414 - מָלַח - mâlach - maw-lakh' - [idiom] at all

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - சாரமாக்கப்படு, தூபவர்க்கமாக்கு, சுத்திகரிக்கப்படு, பதப்படுத்து. ஒழிந்துபோ
1) to tear away, to dissipate; (Niphal) to be dispersed, to be dissipated
c) (Hophal) to be rubbed or washed with salt

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; properly to rub to pieces or pulverize; intransitively to disappear as dust; also (as denominative from H4417) to salt whether internally (to season with salt) or externally (to rub with salt): - X at all, salt, season, temper together, vanish away.
Cognate: H4408, H4414, H4417, H4418, H4419, H4420
